CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISNULL(Progress_Report_1_Date__c)), CASE(MONTH(Progress_Report_1_Date__c) , 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", "December") & ' ' & TEXT(DAY(Progress_Report_1_Date__c)) & ', ' & TEXT(YEAR(Progress_Report_1_Date__c))& '; ', '') & IF(NOT(ISNULL(Progress_Report_2_Date__c)), CASE(MONTH(Progress_Report_2_Date__c) , 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", "December") & ' ' & TEXT(DAY(Progress_Report_2_Date__c)) & ', ' & TEXT(YEAR(Progress_Report_2_Date__c))&"; ", '') & IF(NOT(ISNULL(Progress_Report_3_Date__c)),CASE(MONTH(Progress_Report_3_Date__c) , 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", "December") & ' ' & TEXT(DAY(Progress_Report_3_Date__c)) & ', ' & TEXT(YEAR(Progress_Report_3_Date__c))&"; ", '') & IF(NOT(ISNULL(Progress_Report_4_Date__c)),CASE(MONTH(Progress_Report_4_Date__c) , 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", "December") & ' ' & TEXT(DAY(Progress_Report_4_Date__c)) & ', ' & TEXT(YEAR(Progress_Report_4_Date__c)), '')
CustomField.label: Progress Report Dates
